subject: Your account is safe
body: Your Google account is safe. We've detected no suspicious activity recently.
name: Google

subject: You've won! Congratulations!
body: Congratulations, you have won a free gift! Click here to claim your prize.
name: Promotions Inc.

subject: Meeting tomorrow morning
body: Just a reminder about our meeting tomorrow at 9 AM. See you there.
name: Jane Doe

subject: Weekly Newsletter: Limited time offer!
body: Don't miss our latest articles and a limited time offer on our premium services.
name: News Updates

subject: Urgent Action Required: Confirm your account
body: We have detected unusual activity on your account. Please click here to confirm your details immediately to avoid suspension.
name: Secure Bank

subject: Your recent order
body: Your order for the book has been shipped. It will arrive by Friday.
name: Amazon

subject: Hey!
body: How are you? I'm free this weekend if you want to hang out.
name: Alex

subject: Unclaimed prize: Get free money now!
body: Congratulations, you have an unclaimed prize waiting for you. This is a very limited time offer.
name: Prize Center
